originalText.text: Peter is an extremely knowledgeable and professional agent that does an excellent job of representing his clients interests in real estate deals. He provides a great support system and ensures his clients wishes are communicated and does everything he can to ensure those wishes are met. As a buyer or seller of New York real estate, I highly recommend Peter as an agent, and am confident he will do all that he can to see a deal all the way through.

text.text: Peter is an extremely knowledgeable and professional agent that does an excellent job of representing his clients interests in real estate deals. He provides a great support system and ensures his clients wishes are communicated and does everything he can to ensure those wishes are met. As a buyer or seller of New York real estate, I highly recommend Peter as an agent, and am confident he will do all that he can to see a deal all the way through.

originalText.text: We have used Peter twice, once to buy and then again, years later, to sell. This was because his original, skilled, valuation was key for meeting our buying needs, resulting in a happy deal.  Peter then went above and beyond on our recent very challenging closing. While dealing with uncooperative tenants, difficult brokers and impatient buyers, Peter was consistently available and professional. His long experience made him a savvy partner—he repeatedly anticipated possible snafus and advised to avoid them. Were we to deal further with NYC apartments, we would definitely call on him.

originalText.text: Peter handled our sale with a great deal of wisdom and tact.  His experience and expertise were well worth the commission.  When things got tough, he persevered.  His recommendations proved reliable.  I highly recommend him.

text.text: Peter handled our sale with a great deal of wisdom and tact.  His experience and expertise were well worth the commission.  When things got tough, he persevered.  His recommendations proved reliable.  I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: I recently worked with Peter on a very intricate real estate transaction and he was the consummate professional and instrumental in tackling every obstacle that came our way. Would highly recommend him to anyone and was a pleasure working with him.

text.text: I recently worked with Peter on a very intricate real estate transaction and he was the consummate professional and instrumental in tackling every obstacle that came our way. Would highly recommend him to anyone and was a pleasure working with him.

originalText.text: I have been working with Peter as my agent for over a decade now. He has helped me with buying and renting properties. I have always been very happy with the level of service and professionalism that Peter provided. He knows the New York real estate market intimately and is always available to help. He’s reliable, trustworthy and knowledgeable.  Peter is a true professional and he gets the job done!
